description: E2E: Multi-source intake pipeline — Confluence + Jira + Smartsheet → Triage → Thread → PM → Plan → Objective → Reconcile → Delta Pack

steps.userQuery:
Intake the following content with the attached Excel file (story2_alignment_test.xlsx):

Confluence pages:
- KYC Evidence Design: Define evidence service API, storage model, and validation rules. Owner: Alice. Date: 2026-02-10. Decisions: use S3 for storage, REST API with versioning. Open questions: retention policy.
- Onboarding Flow: Client onboarding steps including identity verification and document upload. Owner: Alice. Date: 2026-02-11. Decisions: 3-step wizard. Action items: build upload component (Bob), integrate KYC check (Alice).

Jira Export (also in Excel Jira_Export sheet):
- J-101: Build Evidence API | Epic: Evidence Service | Status: In Progress | Owner: Alice | Priority: High
- J-102: UI for onboarding | Epic: Onboarding | Status: Todo | Owner: Bob | Priority: Medium
- J-103: Validation rules | Epic: Evidence Service | Status: Todo | Owner: Alice | Priority: High
- J-104: Refactor intake | Epic: (none) | Status: Todo | Owner: Charlie | Priority: Low

Smartsheet Plan (also in Excel Smartsheet_Plan sheet):
- Phase 1: Evidence Service | Milestone: Evidence Service Ready | Owner: Bob | Target: 2026-03-15
- Phase 2: Onboarding | Milestone: Onboarding Complete | Owner: Alice | Target: 2026-03-20

agentResponses.responseFallback:
Content classified.

### Topic: Evidence Service Design
**Type:** architecture_decision
**Decisions:** Use S3 for storage, REST API with versioning
**Open Questions:** Retention policy
**Action Items:** None identified
**Key Content:** KYC evidence service API, storage model, validation rules. Owner: Alice. Date: 2026-02-10.

### Topic: Onboarding Flow
**Type:** action_item
**Decisions:** 3-step wizard
**Open Questions:** None
**Action Items:** Build upload component (Bob), Integrate KYC check (Alice)
**Key Content:** Client onboarding steps including identity verification and document upload.

Content types detected: CONFLUENCE_EXPORT, JIRA_DUMP, SMARTSHEET_EXPORT

Creating threads from classified topics.

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_thread", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test", "title": "Evidence Service Design", "content": "## Evidence Service Design

Define evidence service API, storage model, and validation rules.

**Decisions:**
- Use S3 for storage
- REST API with versioning

**Open Questions:**
- Retention policy

**Owner:** Alice
**Date:** 2026-02-10", "decisions": ["Use S3 for storage", "REST API with versioning"], "actions": []}}
</tool_call>

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_thread", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test", "title": "Onboarding Flow", "content": "## Onboarding Flow

Client onboarding steps including identity verification and document upload.

**Decisions:**
- 3-step wizard

**Action Items:**
- Build upload component (Bob)
- Integrate KYC check (Alice)", "decisions": ["3-step wizard"], "actions": [{"text": "Build upload component", "assignee": "Bob"}, {"text": "Integrate KYC check", "assignee": "Alice"}]}}
</tool_call>
Created 2 threads: 'Evidence Service Design' and 'Onboarding Flow'.

Processing Jira export data. Reading Excel file for Jira_Export sheet.

<tool_call>
{"name": "excel", "args": {"operation": "read", "file_path": "story2_alignment_test.xlsx", "sheet_name": "Jira_Export"}}
</tool_call>

Jira data loaded. Creating tickets grouped by epic.

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_ticket", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test", "title": "J-101: Build Evidence API", "description": "Epic: Evidence Service | Status: In Progress | Owner: Alice | Priority: High", "priority": "HIGH"}}
</tool_call>

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_ticket", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test", "title": "J-102: UI for onboarding", "description": "Epic: Onboarding | Status: Todo | Owner: Bob | Priority: Medium", "priority": "MEDIUM"}}
</tool_call>

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_ticket", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test", "title": "J-103: Validation rules", "description": "Epic: Evidence Service | Status: Todo | Owner: Alice | Priority: High", "priority": "HIGH"}}
</tool_call>

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_ticket", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test", "title": "J-104: Refactor intake", "description": "Epic: (none) — ORPHANED WORK: no epic assigned | Status: Todo | Owner: Charlie | Priority: Low", "priority": "LOW"}}
</tool_call>

Created 4 tickets. Grouped by epic:
- Evidence Service: J-101, J-103
- Onboarding: J-102
- No Epic (orphaned): J-104

Processing Smartsheet plan data.

<tool_call>
{"name": "excel", "args": {"operation": "read", "file_path": "story2_alignment_test.xlsx", "sheet_name": "Smartsheet_Plan"}}
</tool_call>

Plan data loaded. Creating phases and milestones.

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_phase", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test", "name": "Phase 1: Evidence Service", "sortOrder": 1, "description": "Evidence service development phase"}}
</tool_call>

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_milestone", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test", "name": "Evidence Service Ready", "targetDate": "2026-03-15", "owner": "Bob", "description": "Phase 1 milestone — Evidence service delivery"}}
</tool_call>

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_phase", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test", "name": "Phase 2: Onboarding", "sortOrder": 2, "description": "Onboarding flow development phase"}}
</tool_call>

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_milestone", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test", "name": "Onboarding Complete", "targetDate": "2026-03-20", "owner": "Alice", "description": "Phase 2 milestone — Onboarding flow delivery"}}
</tool_call>

Created 2 phases and 2 milestones:
- Phase 1: Evidence Service → Milestone: Evidence Service Ready (Bob, 2026-03-15)
- Phase 2: Onboarding → Milestone: Onboarding Complete (Alice, 2026-03-20)

Synthesizing objectives from tickets and threads.

<tool_call>
{"name": "compute_coverage", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test"}}
</tool_call>

Coverage computed. Derived objectives:
- Deliver Evidence Service: linked to J-101, J-103, thread 'Evidence Service Design'
- Complete Onboarding Flow: linked to J-102, thread 'Onboarding Flow'

Coverage: Evidence Service 50% (1/2 in progress), Onboarding 0% (0/1 started).

Cross-referencing all project data for reconciliation.

<tool_call>
{"name": "read_tickets", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test"}}
</tool_call>

<tool_call>
{"name": "read_objectives", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test"}}
</tool_call>

<tool_call>
{"name": "read_phases", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test"}}
</tool_call>

Reconciliation complete. Detected 4 deltas. Creating delta pack.

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_delta_pack", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test", "projectName": "Story 2 Alignment Test", "deltas": [{"deltaType": "MISSING_EPIC", "severity": "HIGH", "title": "Evidence Service epic not consistently mapped", "description": "Epic 'Evidence Service' exists in Jira for J-101 and J-103, but J-104 has no epic assignment", "sourceA": "Jira", "sourceB": "Jira", "suggestedAction": "Assign J-104 to an epic or confirm it is standalone work"}, {"deltaType": "DATE_DRIFT", "severity": "MEDIUM", "title": "Evidence Service milestone date drift", "description": "Confluence design date is 2026-02-10 but Smartsheet milestone target is 2026-03-15 — 33 day gap", "sourceA": "Confluence", "sourceB": "Smartsheet", "fieldName": "targetDate", "valueA": "2026-02-10", "valueB": "2026-03-15", "suggestedAction": "Confirm if March 15 target is realistic given current ticket progress"}, {"deltaType": "OWNER_MISMATCH", "severity": "HIGH", "title": "Evidence Service owner mismatch", "description": "Alice owns Evidence Service tickets (J-101, J-103) but Bob owns the Evidence Service Ready milestone in Smartsheet", "sourceA": "Jira", "sourceB": "Smartsheet", "fieldName": "owner", "valueA": "Alice", "valueB": "Bob", "suggestedAction": "Clarify single owner for Evidence Service deliverable"}, {"deltaType": "ORPHANED_WORK", "severity": "MEDIUM", "title": "J-104 has no epic", "description": "Ticket J-104 (Refactor intake) is not mapped to any epic, objective, or phase", "sourceA": "Jira", "sourceB": "(none)", "suggestedAction": "Assign to an existing epic or create a new one"}]}}
</tool_call>

Creating blindspot for critical finding.

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_blindspot", "args": {"projectId": "story2-alignment-test", "title": "Owner mismatch on Evidence Service", "description": "Alice owns Jira tickets but Bob owns the Smartsheet milestone — unclear who is accountable for delivery", "category": "MISSING_OWNER", "severity": "HIGH"}}
</tool_call>

Delta pack created with 4 deltas:
- MISSING_EPIC (HIGH): Evidence Service epic not consistently mapped
- DATE_DRIFT (MEDIUM): Evidence Service milestone date drift (Feb 10 → Mar 15)
- OWNER_MISMATCH (HIGH): Alice vs Bob on Evidence Service
- ORPHANED_WORK (MEDIUM): J-104 has no epic

1 blindspot created for the owner mismatch finding.

{"pass": true, "summary": "Full 7-phase pipeline executed: Triage classified 3 source types, Thread agent created 2 threads, PM agent created 4 tickets grouped by epic, Plan agent created 2 phases and 2 milestones, Objective agent derived 2 objectives with coverage, Reconcile agent produced delta pack with 4 deltas and 1 blindspot."}
